cat.lump.aq.log

Class LumpLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.log.LumpLogger

  • public class LumpLogger
extends java.lang.Object
    A link to the log4j different configurations. It allows for invoking a logger either for console, file, or both console and file output. TODO indeed right now only the console option is available.
